member.name: NMLVSCROLL

member.name: NMLVSCROLL.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains information about a LVN_ENDSCROLL or a LVN_BEGINSCROLL notification code.

member.name: NMLVSCROLL.dx
member.summary: Value of type int that specifies in pixels the horizontal position where a scrolling operation should begin or end.

member.name: NMLVSCROLL.dy
member.summary: Value of type int that specifies in pixels the vertical position where a scrolling operation should begin or end.
